attributes.action: All phones should be allowed with students at break and lunch
attributes.additional_details: Students should be allowed phones due to safety reasons and because students phones can be stolen inside school. And for safety concerns they should be fully allowed for example so they can take care of it and it is not stolen. And just in case if students contact their parents for emergencies
attributes.background: All phones should be allowed with students at break and lunch

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

Restrictions on the use of mobile phones on school premises during the school day is a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
